info.name: Telepolis AMP
info.description: Fixes issues with the Telepolis AMP styles (usable in browsers that support Stylish on mobile phones; tested with Firefox).
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0: Make question and answer sections distinguishable and prepend questions with "TP: "
v1.1: Smaller h2
v1.2: .textbox styling
v1.3: next text-indent of quotation segments further decreased
